about.title: About FreeFocusGames
about.metaTitle: About FreeFocusGames | Free Brain Training Games
about.metaDescription: FreeFocusGames offers free, science-based brain training games to help improve your memory, attention, and focus. Created by someone who believes everyone deserves access to cognitive training.

content.paragraph1: Hi there! I'm the creator of FreeFocusGames. I built this website because I got frustrated with constantly running into paywalls and those outdated, cumbersome website experiences when searching for quality brain training games. I firmly believe everyone should be able to freely access these tools without being blocked by subscription barriers.
content.paragraph2: Every single game here is grounded in cognitive science research - things like working memory training, attention exercises, and processing speed challenges. I've carefully designed them to be both effective and truly enjoyable. Whether you're a student hoping to boost focus, an adult concerned about memory health, or simply a friend curious about brain training, this place is prepared just for you.
content.paragraph3: I hope these games prove helpful and bring you joy. There's no pressure here - just choose whatever games spark your interest and enjoy the process. Even playing for just a few minutes each day is a beneficial mental workout.
content.paragraph4: If you have any feedback or suggestions, I'd be delighted to hear from you.
